name: territorybalance
title: Territory Balancing
description: This component splits an area into k continuous territories such that a specified metric is balanced.

inputs.name: input_table
inputs.title: Input table
inputs.description: The table with the gridify-enriched Area of Interest

inputs.name: index_column
inputs.title: Index column
inputs.description: Variable to be used as cell unique identifier (H3 or Quadbin)

inputs.name: similarity_feats
inputs.title: Similarity features(s)
inputs.description: Variable(s) to be used as similarity measurement

inputs.name: npartitions
inputs.title: Number of territories
inputs.description: Number of partitions to split the AOI into

inputs.name: keep_input_columns
inputs.title: Keep input columns
inputs.description: Whether to include all input columns in the output table

outputs.name: output_table
outputs.title: Output table
outputs.description: The table with the specified territories
